attributes.action: Give a final date for cutting off claims to banks for PPI and other similar.
attributes.additional_details:
How many of us have been constantly bombarded with calls from these claim companies . Even when claims have already been made. 
Whilst I am not saying banks should be let off if we want them to get back to normal we have to give final dates so that we can all concentrate on moving forward.Lets send a message that we do not want to turn into a claim culture and STOP the growth of the parasite industries.
attributes.background:
We need to stop  the call centre parasite culture and give deadlines for claims . How long do people need to make a claim if they are so incensed and upset.with over £5 billion pounds paid out to claim companies we need more fix level uniform penalties to be imposed.
Let's STOP Unsolicited Calls.

rejection.details:
This would be a matter for the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA), which is independent of the Government and Parliament. You can contact the FCA here:

https://www.fca.org.uk/contact
